description: He is the first US secretary of state to visit the country for a quarter of a century.
title: Pompeo offers Belarus oil in rare visit
title_page: Pompeo offers Belarus oil in rare visit - BBC News
maintext: "The US prioritises respect for human rights, a strong civil society and freedom of the press in every corner of the world. Further progress in those areas is the only path towards lifting sanctions," Mr Pompeo said.
